entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 22 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 22 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 13 February 2023
